packBlocks.title: Live the AÜRT + HILTON experience
packBlocks.bioText: Enjoy the full Aürt Tasting menu and finish your experience in one of the comfortable rooms from the Hilton Diagonal Mar Barcelona, with breakfast included.

This offer includes the Aürt Tasting menu for 2 people (drinks not included) and one night accommodation at the Hotel Hilton Diagonal Mar Barcelona, with breakfast included. Check conditions on reservation process.
